definition: ear dirt/common word for earwax 耵聹|耵聍

sentences.english: Note any cerumen or earwax that may impair your view.
sentences.chinese: 注意任何的耳垢或者耳屎可能会影响你的视线。

sentences.english: Earwax comes in two types, wet and dry.
sentences.chinese: 耳垢分为干态和湿态两种。

sentences.english: People doing that believe ear candling can extract ear wax and remove toxins .
sentences.chinese: 人们相信这样做耳烛可以提取耳垢，去除毒素。

sentences.english: Obstruction of the ear canal by wax causes a relatively mild hearing loss.
sentences.chinese: 耳垢堵塞耳道会引起轻度的听力下降。

sentences.english: There is much impacted cerumen over the right external acoustic canal.
sentences.chinese: 在右边外听道有许多塞住的耳垢。

sentences.english: D. Inspect canal for buildup of cerumen.
Earwax is normally  expelled; it falls out of the ear or gets washed away.
sentences.chinese: 耳垢一般会被清除，它会掉出耳朵或者被水冲走。

sentences.english: East Asians commonly have dry earwax.
sentences.chinese: 东亚人通常是干燥的耳垢。

sentences.english: The gene's role seems to be to export substances out of the cells that secrete earwax.
sentences.chinese: 该基因可以控制细胞排出物质以分泌耳垢。

sentences.english: It traps dirt and other matter and it keeps insects out.
sentences.chinese: 耳垢可以防止污垢，异物和昆虫进入耳内。
东方亚洲人通常会有干的耳垢。

sentences.english: The glanze in the ear cannel that produce the wax make too much in some people.
sentences.chinese: 一些人耳道内的腺体会分泌太多的耳垢。

sentences.english: The  glands in the ear  canal that produce the wax make too much in some people.
sentences.chinese: 在有些人中，耳道中的腺体会产生过多的耳垢。

sentences.english: The glands in the ear canal that produce the wax make too much in some people.
sentences.chinese: 一些人耳孔内分泌耳垢的腺体过多。

sentences.english: People who do it say it's helpful for relieving earwax and treating some infections.
sentences.chinese: 耳烛疗者认为这样有助于去除耳垢，治疗某些感染。

definition: external auditory meatus/auditory canal, between the outer ear 外耳 and tympanum 鼓膜
internal auditory meatus (canal in temporal bone of skull housing auditory nerves)
variant of 棉籤|棉签[mian2 qian1]/cotton swab
